item.title: Write HTML dynamically with mini SSG
item.description: This is a story about me: One day, I need to make a simple static website. Create a folder with ONE HTML file. “index.html” The next day, I want to add a new file “about.html”, so I make a new file, and then copy-paste all the header, footer, and sidebar to make my pages consistent. The next day, I need to add a new file again.. again.. and again. Just like before, I need to copy-paste most of the part, let alone the annoying meta tag between head with all the social graph and Twitter cards.
